We are making a better Environment|Workspace|Community for you.

Foster creativity and collaboration in a dynamic coworking environment. Embrace flexible workspaces designed for productivity and community.

The Center is a network of 9 workspaces, from 200 to 3,700 sqft, Build and Designed to support Personal and Businesses in the Creative World.

Comfortable, private spaces tailored for focused work.

Explore our gallery to see the inspiring spaces our members enjoy.

Fiber Optic WiFi

Stay connected with our high-speed fiber optic WiFi available throughout the space, ensuring seamless online experiences.

Cafeteria

Enjoy a variety of delicious meals and snacks in our well-equipped cafeteria area, perfect for taking breaks and recharging.

Flexible Desks

Choose any desk that suits your work style, with options available to accommodate your needs, making it easy to stay productive.

Lockers

Secure your personal items in our conveniently located lockers, providing peace of mind and easy access whenever you need.

100% Secure

Feel safe and secure with our advanced security systems and measures, designed to protect you and your belongings at all times.

Printers & Fax

Access printers and fax machines for all your document needs, ensuring you can handle any printing or communication tasks with ease.

Common Area

Relax, socialize, or network in our comfortable and spacious common areas, designed to foster a sense of community and collaboration.

24x7 Access

Work on your schedule with around-the-clock access to the space, giving you the flexibility to work whenever it suits you best.

Other Activities

Participate in a variety of activities and events organized for our members, offering opportunities for learning, networking, and fun.

Terms & Conditions

  • Hours indicated are for access to the space NOT the Internet Connection.
  • Payment is upfront. We accept Cash and VISA/Master Cards, 2% Credit Card surcharge applies.
  • Monthly Plan starts from the date of signup for 30 days.
  • Sorry NO Pausing Memberships and NO Cancellations.
  • Sorry NO Upgrading Plans you need to use the hours in the plan.
  • If you run out of hours you can buy additional hours at the rate above, through our website or front desk.
  • If you wish to change plan once you’re on a plan this is done only at the end of the month or once you use your hours.
  • Additional Printing is charged at $0.30 for Black and White A4 & A3 and $2 for Colour A4 & A3.
  • Skype Booths must be booked 1 day prior to date of use. & Keys will be dispensed at the frontdesk. Additional Skype Booth usage will be charged at $5 per hour.
  • Storage Lockers are first come first serve and are subject to availability.
  • Additional Charge for Mail Delivery.
  • Pets are not allowed.
